name: PROJECT SIGMA
description:
Follow Jane on her adventure to unravel the mystery of a cursed village!

Supposed to be an open world RPG (in the future); this prototype has an introductory mission and the main mission.

Music by Jay Man
www.ourmusicbox.com
Tracks:
- Picket Fences
- Web Of Deceit
- With Loved Ones
- Grand Fury
- Been Thru It All
- Surreal State
- Beautiful Danger
- Happy Fun Punk
